segments.text: I’m so worried about what’s going to happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl should tell him to be careful before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so slippery, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip and fall before she even realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so reckless, and no one is stopping them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s just chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman realizes what’s happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
